entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:13 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow. Snow beginning overnight. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except easterly 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except easterly 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains early in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. High minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of snow. High minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. High minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
